product_name: Adventure Paddleboarding Explorer 2 Bamboo Stand Up Paddle Board - 10'
long_description: Suited for all paddlers, beginner to experienced, the Explorer 2 paddle board has a stable displacement hull and chop-piercing bow designed to cut through the water with excellent glide and flow.
short_description: Suited for all paddlers, beginner to experienced, the Explorer 2 paddle board has a stable displacement hull and chop-piercing bow designed to cut through the water with excellent glide and flow.
